name: Plusiophone V1.2
description:
This is just a little project I made. I don't expect to really update it, but here it is.
It's controlled using the keys marked on the buttons. The text in Grey is what the note is.
It has one Octave of notes, 4 different rhythm instruments, and 2 cute little faces.

Yes, I know it's not practical.

Changelog for Plusiophone 1.2

  • Improved the controls
  • Improved the visuals
  • Added another Octave to the Melody
  • Changed Rhythm controls
  • Added a new instrument, Bass
  • Fixed a few bugs
  • Fixed the spelling error on the 'Rhythm' label
